name: Magic Pop Shooter
description:
Magic POP Shooter an addictive game that should be in you phone library

Shoot the Bubbles and Collect the Magical Bottles to Help the professor to create and magical passion.

- Shoot the bubbles and last the way up
- Explore 100 challenging levels
- Amazing Colours and Design
- Powerful boosters
- Free Downloads and free Levels Updates

your target in each level is to collect the magical bottles
